name: Hearts of Ice - Hockey War
description:
No coward plays hockey! Hearts of Ice - Hockey War is a real Battle on the hockey rink. Increase your character's passion for revenge and hit the opponent till the knockout.

-------
USE SEVERAL TYPES OF THE HIT
-------
Kick - let air out of your rival.
Hit with hockey-stick - disorientate him.
Headbutt - make him move back.
Hit with shoulder - knock your opponent down.

-------
MIND THE BALANCE
-------
Try not to let your hockey-player fall, keep the distance, but don't appear in the firing line.

------
In Ice Hockey 3D - Revenge Fight you can hit your opponent until his teeth fall out. Real revenge is in your hands - Hearts of Ice - Hockey War!
